title: >>> Eve of DESTRUCTION
body_text:
Winston vs. Winston
,
Adams vs. Adams
, and now,
Nogueira vs. Nogueira
. Truly a match lost in time, a "lost file" if you will. Though Mom probably isn't too happy, this 7th
Family Feud
went off without a hitch.
>> Nogueira vs. Nogueira
Decimation. Destruction. There was no remorse ...
Bulletballs were rocketed from every direction at every second with one Kathryn Nogueira and her swarm of allies the victims. It was perhaps most obvious by the third game that the youngest Nogueira stood little to no chance of survival during the three-hour melee. And it's not that Team KATHRYN lacked the needed star power. Mike Butler, the returning Ryan Letsche, Alison Bertsch, Chris Adams, among others remained strong, courageously attempting to rebound through the losses.
But with catching-machine Mike "Sputz" and the deadly "KKK" alliance of Kevins (Adams, "Fitz", Megill) as frontrunners of Team LIZ, Team KATHRYN had no alternative but to take the hellacious beating and like it.
It's supposed to be a joyous weekend where families come together in celebration of the all Mothers nationwide. It's pretty clear that did not happen at this historic showdown.
In just the third singles shut-out and the sixth
Slaughter Victory
, Liz Nogueira decimated her sister Kathryn 10 to 0. But giving credit where credit is due, Team KATHRYN's efforts are certainly applauded having shown no signs of fatigue or quit.
Moments & Stars
: Team KATHRYN's Alison Bertsch and Diana DiBuccio in many showdowns against Team LIZ member Melissa Kerr; John Tronolone on the receiving end of a stinging hip shot from Mike Butler; the renewed rivalry between Justin Godynick and Justin Pierce
"... It was nice to be back on the dodgeball court since being absent for awhile. I just went out there and did the best I could. I thought my teammates did a great job but when you face another team that has members such as Mike ["Sputz"], Ryan McCrorey, and Derek Carty on it, it's tough to take them down. But I had a great time and I can't wait for the mayhem next week."
- RYAN LETSCHE
Gettin' Up There ... 87th Records
> Attendance: 32
> Biggest Return: Justin Godynick (Last appearance at DODGEBALL XLIV)
> Other Notable Returns: Dan Karen (Last appearance at DODGEBALL 48); Liz & Kathryn Nogueira (Last appearance at DODGEBALL LXIV); Derek Carty (Last appearance at DODGEBALL 68)
> New Players: (4) Stephanie Gobbo, Jill McCauley, Maria Loyo, Jay Alpert
- This was the first attendance over 30 since DODGEBALL LXXXI (also known as
The CREAMation
) in late-March.
- DODGEBALL 87 was
Wet War XIX
. This kept with the odd-numbered pattern ... LXXXI, EIGHTY-THREE, and 85 were
Wet Wars
as well.
- Action spilled onto the Wall High School back courts for the 4th week in a row. Human Rims served as team regeneration.
-
Liz Nogueira vs. Kathryn Nogueira
was just the seventh siblings match. It was a first for the Nogueira sisters.
- Liz's defeat of her sister makes her just the third singles captain to win via a shut-out. The first, interestingly enough, was Kathryn several months ago. Each have a current record of 1-1-0.
- This was the third straight seven-event where a
Slaughter Victory
occured, the sixth overall.
"I thought it was great. 'Wet Wars' are always good. Plus, being on an awesome team also helps!!"
- MIKE "SPUTZ" KROTT
________________________________________
_________________
DODGEBALL 88
Two of the very best with unlimited potential meet one on one. It's
Undefeated vs. Undefeated
,
Mike Edwards
vs.
Mike Butler
on May 19.
DODGEBALL 89
Announced at DODGEBALL 87!
On May 26, the returning
Dan Spengeman
goes up against high-flyin' superstar, the re-emerging
Derek Carty
!
DODGEBALL 90
The big one coming June 2 ... Season 1 Icons collide when
Justin Pierce
faces
Tom Adams
for all the marbles.
________________________________________
_________________
Congratulations Luke!
Thanks to Ryan Letsche for the following:
http://www.app.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20070512/BUSINESS/705120366/1003

Gettin' Up There ... 87th Records
> Attendance: 32
> Biggest Return: Justin Godynick (Last appearance at DODGEBALL XLIV)
> Other Notable Returns: Dan Karen (Last appearance at DODGEBALL 48); Liz & Kathryn Nogueira (Last appearance at DODGEBALL LXIV); Derek Carty (Last appearance at DODGEBALL 68)

- DODGEBALL 87 was Wet War XIX. This kept with the odd-numbered pattern ... LXXXI, EIGHTY-THREE, and 85 were Wet Wars as well.
- Action spilled onto the Wall High School back courts for the 4th week in a row. Human Rims served as team regeneration.

- MIKE "SPUTZ" KROTT
_________________________________________________________

DODGEBALL 88
Two of the very best with unlimited potential meet one on one. It's Undefeated vs. Undefeated, Mike Edwards vs. Mike Butler on May 19.

DODGEBALL 89
Announced at DODGEBALL 87! On May 26, the returning Dan Spengeman goes up against high-flyin' superstar, the re-emerging Derek Carty!

DODGEBALL 90
The big one coming June 2 ... Season 1 Icons collide when Justin Pierce faces Tom Adams for all the marbles.

Congratulations Luke!
